org.redpin.android.ui.components
Class MapView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.AbsoluteLayout
              android.webkit.WebView
                  org.redpin.android.ui.components.MapView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewGroup.OnHierarchyChangeListener, ViewManager, ViewParent, ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalFocusChangeListener, DownloadImageTask.DownloadImageTaskCallback
public class MapView
extends WebView
implements DownloadImageTask.DownloadImageTaskCallback, GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener

MapView displays a Map on the screen and its Location s depending on the selection of the user.

Author:
Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch)
